owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: Home automation conceptualization is based on DogOnt 1.0.5 Home Automation Ontology.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: maximum energy amount that a facility can produce

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: actuallyConsumesEnergy
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: how much energy is consumed by an energy facility at a certain point in time
this property was known as "currentlyConsumesEnergy" in prior versions of the ontology

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: actuallyProducesEnergy
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The amount of energy a facility produces at a certain point in time

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: consumesEnergy
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: How much energy is consumed by a certain energy facility

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: consumesEnergyType
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The energy type that is consumed by a specific energy consuming facility

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates which object are contained in a building environment, e.g. the kitchen contains Lamp1,Lamp2...

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: controlledObject
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between a controller and the controlled object

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasActuator
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between a mobile uncontrollable object and its actuator
hasBuildingAutomationNetworkType
Connects a domotic facility with the representation of its supported building automation network

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasControl
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between an object and its controller,e.g.switch,button,knob

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasCurrentStateValue
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The currently active mode (StateValue) of a facility
this property was known as "hasActiveMode" in prior versions of the ontology

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasEcologicalImpact
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: the ecological impact of the associated non-renewable energy source

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasEnergyDemand
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The energy demand of a facility in a specific state

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasEnergySource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: determines the energy sources of an energy provider or a renewable energy producing facility (e.g. solar, biomass, nuclear, hydropower)

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasEnergySupply
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The energy supply of a facility in a specific state

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasEnergyTariff
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Connection to the energy tariff for a specific amount of energy provided by a specific energy provider

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasFieldOfApplication
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The field of application of a certain facility or zone

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasFunctionality
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Provide functionalities to controllable things

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasGainValue
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The gain value of an energy recovery tariff
Relates a given domotic component with the network level gateway used to control it

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasMonetaryEnergyCost
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: monetary equivalent for a specific energy resource

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasSensor
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between an object or space and its sensor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasTimeFrame
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Time interval for describing energy tariff schemes.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasWall
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between a room and its walls

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasWallOpening
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between a wall and its opening like door,window
this object property models the connection between an energy type and its default energy provider

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isIn
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates in which building environment is contained an object, e.g. the lamp5 isIn Kitchen

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isInWall
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between a wallopening(door or window) and the wall opening where it is

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isTariffForConsumableEnergy
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: the consumable energy for which the tariff is charged. This relates to energy forms being supplied to the smart home

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isTariffForEnergySource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The concrete energy source for which this tariff is charged. In the case of secondary energy it additionally represents the time frames in which this tariff is charged. In the case of primary energy it denotes the concrete energy source individual

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: maxConsumesEnergy
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: how much energy is maximally consumed by a certain energy facility in a specific state

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: maxProducesEnergy
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Energy value of the specified energy resource in full operation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: ofEnergyType
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of energy of a certain energy demand or supply

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: producesEnergy
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: How much energy is produced by a certain energy producing facility

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: producesEnergyType
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An energy facility in the home produces a certain kind of energy type (e.g. SolarPanel produces energy type ElectricEnergy)

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: providesEnergyType
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of energy that is provided by an energy provider with respect to its usage (e.g. heating,electricity)
A property holding the svg footprint for the given building environment object

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: storesEnergyCapacity
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Energy Capacity that is stored per unit of a certain energy carrier

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: IPAddress
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The IP address of the gateway

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: connectionTimeOut
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The time before the connection expires

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: connectionTrials
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of connection trials before failure

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: flashingTime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The flashing period duration in seconds

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: groupAddress
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The address of the group of the component

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: hasName
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name of a company or person

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: hasNativeUnit
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The native unit of the described energy unit

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: hasPostalAddress
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: the postal address of a company or person

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: hasRelatedUnit
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: unit to which this value is related to. value of this related unit is always 1 if no related value is given, while the native value for the given energy unit is set in relation to this (e.g. KwH/Liter)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: individualAddress
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The individual address of the component

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: maxValue
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The maximum value of a continuous range

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: minValue
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The minimum value of a continuous range

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: multicastIP
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The multicast address of the gateway

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: needsPermanentSupply
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: If a certain facility needs permanent power suppy

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: percentageOfEnergyMix
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: describes the percentage of an energy source in the energy mix of an energy provider

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: physicalAddress
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The address of the component

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: physicalType
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The category of the component

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: pollingInterval
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The interval between subsequent polls

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: port
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The port of the gateway

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: sleepTime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The time between connection trials

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: timeToOff
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The time in seconds during which the object is turned on

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: udpPort
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The port for UDP connections

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: valueContinuous
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The value of the state of an object

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: valueDiscrete
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The discrete state of an object

owl:Class.rdfs:label: AccessControlSystem
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that provides security about access

owl:Class.rdfs:label: AccessSecurityFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities in the access security sector (e.g. door sensors, window sensors, door openers)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: AcousticSystemResource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: resource that makes some sound

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Actuator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that puts something into automatic action

owl:Class.rdfs:label: AirConditioningSystem
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that is capable of changing air state (e.g. cooling, heating, etc.)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: AiringFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facility connected to airing with external air (e.g. air condition, airing system, air flow detection)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: AlarmClock
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A clock that wakes sleeper at preset time

owl:Class.rdfs:label: AnnualPowerTimeFrame
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Power interval on the basis of a year

owl:Class.rdfs:label: AnsweringMachine
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Electronic device that answers the telephone and records messages

owl:Class.rdfs:label: AntiIntrusionSystem
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that provides security about intrusion

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Appliance
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Durable goods for home or office use

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Architectural
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: All the architectural elements that compose the environment

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Awning
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A canopy made of canvas to shelter people or things from rain or sun.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: AwningActuator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that allow automatic control about awning

owl:Class.rdfs:label: BTicinoComponent
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Components manufactured by Bticino

owl:Class.rdfs:label: BTicinoGateway
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A BTIcino Gateway

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Boiler
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sealed vessel where water is warm up

owl:Class.rdfs:label: BoilerController
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device for controlling a boiler facility

owl:Class.rdfs:label: BrownGoods
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Small household electrical entertainment appliances

owl:Class.rdfs:label: BuildingAutomationNetwork
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Specific networks for building automation devices.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: BuildingAutomationSystemResource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: All plants of the house, e.g. Electrical system, Hydraulic system

owl:Class.rdfs:label: BuildingEnvironment
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A physical environment in which people lives, e.g. kitchen, bathroom

owl:Class.rdfs:label: BuildingThing
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: All things that creates a Building, it is intended as root of all building components

owl:Class.rdfs:label: BurnerController
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device for controlling a burner facility

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Button
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A monostable electrical switch operated by pressing a button

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Buzzer
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Electronic signaling device

owl:Class.rdfs:label: CO2Emission
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: CO2 Emission value of a certain primary energy source

owl:Class.rdfs:label: CO2Sensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that detects CO2 concentration in the air

owl:Class.rdfs:label: CaloricEnergyCapacity
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The caloric capacity of a specific material

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ceiling
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The overhead upper surface of a room

owl:Class.rdfs:label: CoffeeMaker
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A facility to make hot drinks

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ColorControlFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality to control the color of a light

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ColorDimmableLight
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Color Dimmable Light device can be switched on and off, and its luminance, hue and saturation levels may be controlled, derives from ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ColorDimmerSwitch
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Color Dimmer Switch device can turn a light on and off, and control the luminance, hue and saturation levels of a multicolor light, derives from ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Communication
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Appliances for communicate

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Computer
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Home or portable computing device

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Console
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device for system access and visualization of system states

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ContinuousFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities continuous in time or space

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ContinuousNotificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Notification of continuous values

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ContinuousState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: States continuous in time or space

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ControlFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Capability of a controllable building thing that can receive commands

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ControlSecurityFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities in the area of controlling (e.g. space, liquid flow)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ControlSystemResource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that controls the interaction with the electrical system

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Controllable
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: All building things that can be controlled by domotic system

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cooker
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A utensil for cooking

owl:Class.rdfs:label: CookingFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for a room or facility used for cooking (e.g. kitchen, oven)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: CoolingFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for a facility connected to the cooling process

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DailyPowerTimeFrame
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Power interval on the basis of a day

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DayPowerTimeFrame
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Interval for day power tariffs

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DeepFreezer
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Electric refrigerator in which food is frozen and stored for long periods of time

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DenyingAccessSecurityFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilites that deny access (e.g. door-lock actuator)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DimmableLight
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Dimmable Light device is a light that can be switched on and off, and whose luminance level may be controlled, derives from ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DimmerLamp
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Lamp that varies the level of illumination

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DimmerSwitch
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Switch for controlling dimmable lights, derives from ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DiningFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for a room or facility used for dining

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DiscreteFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities not continuous, with fixed values

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DiscreteNotificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Notification of fixed values

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DiscreteState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: States not continuous with fixed values

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dishwasher
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A machine for washing dishes

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DistrictCoolingProvider
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Company that provides district cooling

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DistrictEnergyProvider
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Company that provides district heating or cooling

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DistrictHeatingProvider
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Company that provides district heating

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DomesticFacilityFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for a facility for domestic use

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DomoticFacilityFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for a facility for building automation

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DomoticNetworkComponent
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The manufacturers of the domotic component

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Door
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A swinging or sliding barrier that will close the entrance to a room or building.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DoorActuator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that allows automatic opening and closing of a door

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DoorSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that controls if a door is closed

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DoubleValuedFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete functionalities with exactly two values

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DoubleValuedNotification
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete notification with exactly two values

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DoubleValuedState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete states with exactly two values

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dvd
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Appliance that reads or writes dvd

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EcologicalEnergyCost
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy costs for environment like CO2 pollution

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ElectricEnergyCapacity
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The electric capacity of a specific material

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ElectricEnergyProvider
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy providers that provide electricity for the end-users.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ElectricalCooker
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Cooker that is operated with electrical energy

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ElectricalFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for electrical facilities

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ElectricalHeater
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heater that combusts electricity

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ElectricalOven
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Oven consuming electrical energy

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ElectricalSystemResource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Building automation device that controls (e.g. switch), needs (e.g. light bulb), or provides electric energy for usage in the building (e.g. sockets).

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EliteComponent
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Emulated component

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EliteGateway
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A software emulator of a network level to be used for simulating devices not available in the real world

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Emission
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Emissions caused by primary energy sources

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergyCapacity
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The energy capacity of a primary energy carrier (e.g. caloric value of gas).

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergyConsumerFacility
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Building Facility that consumes some amount of energy

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergyCost
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The energy cost of a certain energy form, either environmental or monetary cost.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergyCostTariff
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Tariffs charged by energy providers for supplied energy

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergyDemand
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The amount of energy consumed by an energy consuming facility

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergyFacility
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Building facility that either consumes or produces energy.
The energy gain of a certain energy form, either particular or monetary gain.
Property to describe energy behavior of modeled facilities
Facilities in the building that produce some kind of energy.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergyProvider
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Organization that provides end user energy in form of primary or secondary energy.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergyRecoveryTariff
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy tariff refunded by providers for recovered energy through e.g. solar collectors

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergySource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy Provider/Producer View: Classification of primary and secondary energy carriers

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergySupply
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The amount of energy produced by an energy facility

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergyTariff
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Tariff that is charged per energy unit by energy providers

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnergyType
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy types classification

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Entertainment
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A diversion that holds the attention

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EntranceFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for a zone or facility connected to the entrance of the building (e.g. hallway, surveillance camera)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnvironmentFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application that describes a part of the building environment

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Equipment
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Equipment and Furniture that make a room or other area ready for occupancy

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FacilityFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application that describes some facility

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fan
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device for creating a current of air

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FanControlFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Models the capability of controlling the speed of a cooling/heating fan. Derives from ZigBee HA

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fax
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Appliance that send text and document

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FenceOpening
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An opening in a Fence

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FieldOfApplication
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Fields of Application for different building facilities and environment

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FinalEnergy
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy Consumer View: energy that can be directly used in the home or be transformed into some other (useful) energy form.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FireSecuritySystem
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that detects the presence of fire

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FlashingLamp
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Lamp that emits light in sudden short or intermittent bursts

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FloodSecuritySystem
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that detects the presence of flood

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FloodSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that detects the presence of flood

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Floor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The inside lower horizontal surface of a room

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FlowSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Flow Sensor device measures and periodically reports the flow rate of air or water

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Refrigerator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Facility to cool goods

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Functionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Capability of a controllable building thing

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GardenFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for zone or facility related with the garden

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasCooker
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Cooker that is operated with gas energy
GasEnergyDemand

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasEnergyProvider
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy provider that provides gas to end-users

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasHeater
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heater that combusts gas

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasOven
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Oven consuming gas energy

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasSecuritySystem
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that detects the presence of gas

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device that senses the presence of gas in the air

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasStove
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Stove that consumes gas energy

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasoilHeater
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heater that combusts gasoil

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Gate
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A door-like movable barrier in a fence

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GateActuator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that allows automatic opening and closing of a gate

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GeoThermalHeatPump
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Central heating or cooling system that pumps heat to or from the ground.
the command for getting the occupancy state of a given room/environment

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GrantingAccessSecurityFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities that grant access (e.g. door opener)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GreenEnergyProvider
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy provider that solely provides energy through renewable energies.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GroupFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GroupNotificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HVACSystemResource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heating Ventilating and Air Conditioning system

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Heater
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device that heats water or supplies warmth

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HeatingAndCoolingUnit
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Heating and Cooling Unit device can heat or cool a space in a house. It is not mandatory to provide both functionalities. It may be an indoor air handler. Derives from ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HeatingFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities connected to the heating process

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HeatingSystem
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Utility to warm a building

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HiFi
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Equipment for the reproduction of sound with high fidelity

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HomePowerPlant
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: an energy producing power plant installed in the surroundings of the building

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Horizontal
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The horizontal architectural component of a building

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Hotplate
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A portable electric appliance for heating or cooking or keeping food warm

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HumanLifeSecurityFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities that are responsible for human life security (e.g. fire detector, water detector)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HumidityFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities concerned with humidity

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HumidityMeasurementFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The capability of measuring the humidity of a room

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HumidityMeasurementNotificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The notification for requesting humidity measurment...

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HumiditySensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device that senses the air relative humidity

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HydroElectricPowerPlant
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Facility that creates electricity through hydropower

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HygieneFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for zone or facility related to hygiene (e.g. bathroom, washing machine)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: IdentificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: IdentificationNotificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Infoscreen
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device mainly mounted to walls and capable of visualization

owl:Class.rdfs:label: InfraredSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that detects the presence of something moving in the sensor's range

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Interphone
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A telephonic intercommunication system linking different rooms in a building

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Knob
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A round handle used to adjust continuous amplitude, e.g. volume

owl:Class.rdfs:label: KonnexComponent
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Components manufactured by Konnex

owl:Class.rdfs:label: KonnexGateway
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Konnex Gateway

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Lamp
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An artificial source of visible illumination

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LeisureFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for zone or facility related to leisure and recreation (e.g. living room, HiFi)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LevelControlFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Level control functionality, used for allowing devices to be controlled in a continuous manner, derives from ZigBee Home Automation specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LevelControlSwitch
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Level control switch, derives from the ZigBee Home Automation specification

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LevelControllableOutput
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Output device whose output level can be controlled continuously, by means of a level-control command (notification), derives from ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LevelNotificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Notification functionality for controlling continuously adjustable device, e.g. dimmers, derives from ZigBee Home Automation specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LightIntensityState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Models the state of the object that illuminates

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LightRegulationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities for the regulation of light

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LightSensingFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The capability of sensing the luminance of the environment in which a device is located accepts only the get command, with 1 parameter, i.e. the luminance value. Derives from ZigBee specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LightSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Light Sensor device reports the illuminance of an area

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LightingFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities connected with lighting

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LightingSystemResource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that provides artificial light

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LiquidDrainageFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities connected with liquid removal

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LiquidFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities connected with liquid supply as well as removal

owl:Class.rdfs:label: LiquidSupplyFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities connected with liquid supply

owl:Class.rdfs:label: MainsPowerOutlet
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Mains socket to receive electricity for consumption in the household

owl:Class.rdfs:label: MicrowaveOven
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Oven for fast heating through microwaves

owl:Class.rdfs:label: MonetaryEnergyCost
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy costs in terms of monetary amount per kilowatt

owl:Class.rdfs:label: MonetaryGain
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: how much monetary gain can be retrieved by one unit of energy of a certain type.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: MonoValuedFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete functionalities with exactly one value

owl:Class.rdfs:label: MonoValuedNotification
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete notification with exactly one values

owl:Class.rdfs:label: MovementSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that detects movement in an area

owl:Class.rdfs:label: NetworkFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: NetworkNotificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications
A command that is specific to a certain building automation network.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: NightPowerTimeFrame
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Intervals for night power tariffs

owl:Class.rdfs:label: NonGreenEnergyProvider
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy provider that provides energry through at least one non renewable energy source
A command that does not take any input parameters

owl:Class.rdfs:label: NonRenewable
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Non renewable energy source
A command that returns a value

owl:Class.rdfs:label: NotificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Capability of a controllable building thing that notifies information,e.g.door sensor notifies "open"-"close"

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OccupancySensingFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality for getting the occupancy state of a given room

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OccupancySensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Occupancy Sensor device reports the occupancy state of an area. Derives from ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OilEnergyProvider
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy provider that provides different forms of heating oil to end-users

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OilEnergySource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: No differentiation between raw and refined oil

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffFlashingFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality to switch on and off an object with a given switching period

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality: turn on - turn off

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffLight
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Simple lamp that can be just turn on or turn off

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffLightSwitch
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: OnOffSwitch for Lights only, derives from ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffNotification
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Notification: on - off

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffOutput
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Models a binary output which can be only in on or off state (OnOffState), compatible with the ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffStandByFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality: on - off - standby

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: State: on - off

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffSwitch
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Generic OnOff switch, derives from the ZigBee Home Automation specification

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OpenCloseFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality: open - close

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OpenCloseNotification
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Notification: open - close

owl:Class.rdfs:label: OpenCloseState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: State: open - close

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Oven
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Kitchen appliance used for baking or roasting

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PDA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Portable computing device (Personal Digital Assistant)
A command that needs input parameters

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PelletHeater
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heater that combusts wood-pellet

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Phone
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Appliance to comunicate with other person

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PlayFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality to start a device's play function

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PowerDelivery
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Devices that are capable of delivering electric power to the household

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PowerTimeFrame
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Intervals to differentiate between different energy price models.
PresenceAndMovementSensor
Sensor that additionally to movement has a presence state

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PresenceSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that detects presence in a specific area

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PressureSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Pressure Sensor device measures and periodically reports the pressure of a liquid (typically water)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PrimaryEnergySource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy form found in nature that has not been subjected to a transformation process.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Printer
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device that produces text or graphics of documents on paper.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Pump
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Pump device is a pump that may have variable speed. It may have optional built-in sensors and a regulation mechanism. It is typically used for pumping water. Derives from ZigBee HA specifications.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PumpController
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Pump device controller can control a Pump facility

owl:Class.rdfs:label: QuadValuedState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete states with exactly four values

owl:Class.rdfs:label: QueryFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Capability of a controllable building thing that must reply to an interrogation about its state

owl:Class.rdfs:label: RadiatorActuator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device to control the valve of a radiator

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Radio
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device to receive radio broadcasts

owl:Class.rdfs:label: RemoteControl
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Component to operate a device wirelessly.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Renewable
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Renewable energy source

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Room
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A room of the building

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Scanner
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device that optically scans images

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SceneFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SceneNotificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SceneSelector
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Scene Selector device is capable of setting up and selecting scenes on other devices, including group of devices. It derives from ZigBee HA specifications.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SecondaryEnergySource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy carrier that is transformed from primary energy

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SecurityFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: General Field Of Application for facilities in the security area

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SecuritySystemResource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Security system for detecting dangerous situation and intrusion

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SelfClosingDoorActuator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that allows the automatic closing of the door after a certain time

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SensorSystemResource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class for grouping all electrically powered sensors
Sets the RGB color value of a color dimmable lamp
Shade object, the name includes an underscore sign only for distinguishing the name from the shade actuator, whose name is directly mapped from ZigBee

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ShadeActuator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Shade Actuator device provides the ability to open or close window coverings, including setting partially open or partially closed states. This device type includes roller shades, drapes and tilt-only blinds actuators. Derives from ZigBee HA specifications (Shade device)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ShadeController
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Shade Controller device can control the level of a shade, derives from ZigBee HA specifications

Value for the Shade position state, the shade position can be expressed as position=closedLimitx(255-level)/255, where with level 0 the shade is closed and with level 255 the shade is completely open. Derives from ZigBee HA specifications.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Shutter
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A hinged cover or screen for a window, usually fitted with louvers.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ShutterActuator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that allows automatic control of a shutter

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ShutterRegulationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities for the regulation of shutter

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ShutterState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Models the state of the shutter

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SimpleLamp
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Simple lamp that can be just turn on or turn off
Models the state of the slats of a shutter

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SleepStandByOnOffState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: State: sleep - standby - on - off

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SleepingFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for a room or facility used for sleeping (e.g. bedroom, sleeping sensor)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SmokeSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that detects the presence of smoke

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SolarPanel
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that generates heat or electricity through solar power

owl:Class.rdfs:label: StandByOnOffState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: State: standby - on - off

owl:Class.rdfs:label: State
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Models the states of the controllable objects

owl:Class.rdfs:label: StepFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality: step up - step down

owl:Class.rdfs:label: StorageFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for a room or facility that is used for storing (e.g. a storage room, fridge, energy storage facility)
Facility with an enclosed heated space to heat a zone
Stove

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SummerPowerTimeFrame
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Interval for summer power tariffs

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SurveillanceCamera
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Camera of video surveillance

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Switch
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bi-stable control consisting of a mechanical or electrical or electronic device for making or breaking or changing the connections in a circuit

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TemperatureFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facility connected to temperature area

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TemperatureMeasurementFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The capability of measuring temperatures

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TemperatureMeasurementNotificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Notifies the measurment of a temperature, through a proper temperature sensor

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TemperatureSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that detects the temperature of the atmosphere

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TemperatureState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Models the temperature value

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Thermostat
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Component which senses the temperature of a system

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TemperatureRegulationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities for the regulation of temperature

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ThermostatNotificationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The thermostat request notification, requires a device having the thermostat control functionality to increase, set or decrease the current temperature. Derives from ZigBee HA (slightly modified...)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TimeRegulationFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities for the regulation of timer

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TimedOnFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality to switch on an object for a given period of time

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ToggleRelay
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Toggle relay switch

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Touchpanel
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device for manual interaction with the system as well as visualization of system states.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TripleValuedFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete functionalities with exactly three values

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TripleValuedState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete states with exactly three values

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TunerFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality for tuning radion broadcast stations

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TV
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device to receive television broadcasting

owl:Class.rdfs:label: UnControllable
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: All building things that can't be controlled by domotic system

owl:Class.rdfs:label: UpDownFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality: up - down

owl:Class.rdfs:label: UpDownRestFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality: up - down - rest

owl:Class.rdfs:label: UpDownRestState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: State: up - down - rest

owl:Class.rdfs:label: UpDownState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: State: up - down

owl:Class.rdfs:label: UsefulEnergy
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy Consumer View: inconvertible form of energy for usage in the building.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: VisualizationSystemResource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System-integrated device capable of visualizing system and household states to the inhabitant

owl:Class.rdfs:label: VentilatingFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for a facility connected to ventilation without fresh external air

owl:Class.rdfs:label: VentilatingSystem
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that is capable of ventilating the air

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ventilator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that circulates fresh air and expels stale or foul air.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Vertical
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The vertical architectural component of a building

owl:Class.rdfs:label: VisualizationFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities that enable visualization of messages to the user (e.g. TV, Panel, PDA, Mobile)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: VisualizationResource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: General device capable of visualizing system states
A command that does not return a value

owl:Class.rdfs:label: VolumeRegularionFunctionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities for the regulation of volume

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Wall
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An architectural partition used to divide or enclose an area or to support another structure.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WallOpening
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An opening in a Wall

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WashingMachine
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A facility to wash clothes

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WasteDisposal
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Primary Energy that needs some waste disposal e.g. nuclear energy
WaterEnergyDemand

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WaterEnergyProvider
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy provider that provides water to households

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WhiteGoods
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Major household appliances

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WindTurbine
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Facility that generates electricity through wind power

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Window
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A framework that contains a glass windowpane and is built into a wall or roof to admit light or air

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WindowActuator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that allows automatic opening and closing of a window

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WindowSensor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that controls if a window is closed

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WinterPowerTimeFrame
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Interval for tariffs valid in the winter season

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WirelessPhone
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Phone with no wire
WoodEnergyDemand

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WoodEnergyProvider
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy provider that provides heating wood

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WoodHeater
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heater that combusts wood

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WoodStove
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Stove that consumes wood energy

owl:Class.rdfs:label: WorkingFOA
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for a room or facility that is used for working purposes

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ZigBeeComponent
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Components manufactured by ZigBee

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Field Of Application for facilities that aid in controlling the environment for security risks (e.g. camera)

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Kitchen1
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: an all-in-one kitchen where the inhabitant can eat, cook and shower

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Fridge1
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: A refrigerator in which the coolant is pumped around by an electric motor

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: WashingMachine1
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: A home appliance for washing clothes and linens automatically
Sensor that detects the presence of gas
A room where people can sit and talk and relax
A system that keeps air cool and dry

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Computer1
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: A machine for performing calculations automatically, work and play
A receiver that displays television images
